about_the_game:
3Souls Parallel Edition is a version of a well recieved game, created for the current generation of gamers, which changes the the gameplay to adapt the use of an older console gamepad for current game controllers and keyboard but sharing the same story, graphics and music from the world of the Ánimas!

With 3Souls Parallel Edition, you will discover the world of Mustland, a place full of rules and secrets… and its own people, the Ánimas, who are mysterious characters wearing a mask with them own soul floating around them.

This adventure is not really about you. It is more about them! So perhaps you could offer them some assistance from your world.



One game, three stories!
In the world of Mustland, each Ánima has a different soul, and they will see, feel, hear and play the world in a different way!
With 3Souls Parallel Edition, you will be able to play as Nelesa, Nophes and Nidemon in this game of 3 chapters.

-Combined with classic platforming, but with adventurous story telling and a unique 'breaking the fourth wall' concept comes an adorable game with three lovable characters.
-A secret ending depending on choices performed through the three episodes.
-Unique ways to solve levels.
-Fully voice acted and available in multiple languages.

Only Windows currently supports unlocking achievements.

reviews:
“3Souls has to be one of the most underrated games of all time. Do yourself a favour and head and download this super-satisfying puzzle-filled package as soon as you can. It's surprisingly inexpensive and for the amount of enjoyable content that you get you'd be silly not to give it a try.”
